name: developmentcats/osrs-kasm
description: Launch Old School RuneScape directly through your browser. App-like experience with Jagex Launcher integration, automatic authentication, smart fullscreen detection, and support for RuneLite and official OSRS clients.
notes: OSRS app experience - launches directly into Jagex Launcher (no desktop clutter). Smart window management auto-fullscreens game clients while ignoring patcher windows. Mount /home/kasm-user/.runelite and /home/kasm-user/.jagex for persistent game settings. Supports RuneLite, official OSRS client, and other Jagex games with performance optimizations.
